SubString.CExoString: This portal leads back to the dream area.
This portal leads back to the dream area.
This portal leads back to the dream area.
This portal leads back to the dream area.
This portal leads back to the dream area.

Upon using this Headstone, your Subrace will be Gold Dwarf. Gold dwarves get +2 Con, -2 Dex instead of the standard +2 Con, -2 Cha as well as +1 attack against aberrations instead of against orcs and goblinoids.

Upon using this Headstone, your Subrace will be Gray Dwarf (Duergar). Gray dwarves get +2 Con, -4 Cha instead of the standard +2 Con, -2 Cha as well as immunity to paralysis and all poisons. Furthermore, you gain +4 to move silently, +1 to listen and spot.
Gray Dwarves can cast Invisibility 1/day, but are sensible to light.
Duergar suffer an XP Penalty and only get 2/3 of the XP for being a powerful race.

Upon using this Headstone, your Subrace will be Dark Elf (Drow).
Drow get +2 Dex, -2 Con, +2 Int, +2 Cha instead of the standard +2 Dex, -2 Con as well as a +2 Will Save against Spells and Spell-like abilities. Drow can cast Darkness 1/day and gain Spell Resistance of 11 + 1/Level. Drow are very sensitive to light.
Drow suffer an XP Penalty and only get 2/3 of the XP for being a powerful race.

Upon using this Headstone, your Subrace will be Sun Elf.
Sun elves get +2 Int, -2 Con instead of the standard +2 Dex, -2 Con.

Upon using this Headstone, your Subrace will be Wild Elf.
Wild elves get +2 Dex, -2 Int instead of the standard +2 Dex, -2 Con. The favored class of Wild Elves is Sorcerer.

Upon using this Headstone, your Subrace will be Wood Elf.
Wood elves get +2 Str, +2 Dex, -2 Con, -2 Int, -2 Cha instead of the standard +2 Dex, -2 Con.
Favored Class of a Wood Elf is Ranger.

Upon using this Headstone, your Subrace will be Deep Gnome (Svirfneblin).
Deep gnomes get -2 Str, +2 Dex, +2 Wis, -4 Cha instead of the standard +2 Con, -2 Str, as well as a +4 dodge bonus against all creatures. Furthermore, deep gnomes get +2 on all saving throws and +2 on hide checks.
Deep Gnomes gain Spell Resistance of 11 + 1 / Level, Stonecunning and can cast Blindness/Deafness 1/day.
Deep Gnomes are a powerful race and get only 2/3 of the XP a non-powerful race gets.

Upon using this Headstone, your Subrace will be Ghostwise Halfling.
Ghostwise halflings do not receive the standard Halfling +1 racial bonus on all saving throws.

Upon using this Headstone, your Subrace will be Strongfoot Halfling.
Strongheart halflings do not receive the standard Halfling +1 racial bonus on all saving throws.

Upon using this Headstone, your Subrace will be Half Drow.
Half-Drow gain Dark Vision.
This portal leads back to the dream area.

Welcome to the Subrace Area.
Upon clicking this sign, you will be teleported to an area where you can select one of the available subraces for your race. At any time, you can decide not to use a subrace and return to the dream area via a "Return to Dream" portal.
In the room itself, you will find headstones, one for each subrace. Examine them to read about the Subrace, use them to become the Subrace. You are only allowed to select once, so choose carefully.
After you selected a Subrace, return to the dream via one of the portals.
